trafsim.trafsim
Class TrafficLight

java.lang.Object
  trafsim.trafsim.TrafficLight
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class TrafficLight
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

Representation of a traffic light in the system

Version:
0.1
Author:
Albin Poignot, Julien Teruel

Field Summary
private  Car car
          The Car object used to simulate a stopped car in order to force the other cars to stop

          List Car
private static java.lang.Integer greenGap
          Duration of the green light
private  Coordinate position
          Position in the system
private static java.lang.Integer redGap
          Duration of the red light
private  java.util.concurrent.Semaphore sem
           
private static java.lang.Integer switchGap
          Duration of switching between green and red
private  javax.swing.Timer timerGreen
          Waiting timer when traffic light is green
private  javax.swing.Timer timerRed
          Waiting timer when traffic light is red
private  javax.swing.Timer timerSwitch
          Waiting timer for the switch from Green to Red

Constructor Detail

TrafficLight

public TrafficLight(Coordinate position,
                    ListCar cl,
                    java.util.concurrent.Semaphore sem)
Overload constructor. Set the position, the carList and the semaphore attributes. Then automatically set the Timers to default values.

Parameters:
position - The position of traffic lights
Method Detail

insertTrafficLight

private void insertTrafficLight()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
Inserts the TrafficLight to the correct position in its carList property

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception when the traffic light can't be inserted in the carList

removeTrafficLight

private void removeTrafficLight()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
Removes the TrafficLight from its carList property

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception when the traffic light can't be removed from the carList

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent arg0)
Automatically called by a Timer. Insert or remove the TrafficLight in its carList when it's time to do it.
Process : wait redGap => become green => wait greenGap => wait switchGap => become red => start over

Specified by:
actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
